column4: Hi everyone, I can't update my system because download of one update archive gets stalled midway.
what is the error msg you are getting
what is the error msg you are getting
are you able to download the other packages?
so just update all the other packages and leave this offending package alone
Even a wget on that file in a terminal atalls midway through the download.
register a bug report complaining about this to the ppa maintainer
you can always get other versions of nvidia and noveau drivers for the time being
maybe the server handling the ppa is refusing persistent connections
or maybe the problem is from your network
